name: 楊士萱
objective:
1.複習實數與複數、向量與矩陣、向量空間、特徵值與特徵向量等重要數學概念。
2.了解微分方程式與轉移函數等科學及工程系統中常用的數學模型。
3.具備基本微分方程式的列式與解題能力，並能應用於科學及工程系統中。
4.學習轉換域的技術並和時域的方法比較，加深學生對重要概念的理解。
schedule:
Textbook:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics (Abridged Internatrional Student Edition) by E. Kreyszig, 10th edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2011. （歐亞書局代理）
Syllabus:
1.Complex Numbers, Chapter 13.
2.Review of Linear Algebra Part 1, Chapter 7. 
3.Review of Linear Algebra Part 2, Chapter 8. 
4.First-Order Ordianry Differential Equations (ODEs), Chapter 1.
5.Second-Order Linear ODEs, Chapter 2.
6.Higher Order Linear ODEs, Chapter 3.
7.Laplace Transforms, Chapter 6.
8.Fourier Analysis, Chapter 11.
scorePolicy:
1.Attendence and in-class recitations, 5%. (extra)
2.Written homeworks, 20%. Please submit it before the class begins (on Wednesdays). Please do not copy someone else' work.
3.Two 50-minute Quizzes, 30% (15% each). 
4.80-minute Midterm Exam, 25%.
5.80-minute Final Exam, 25%.
materials:
Reference:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics by P. V. O'Neil, Thomson, 2007.
